overview: Two American soldiers are on leave in Paris on Armistice Day and, due to a misunderstanding, believe that they've killed a man, although accidentally. When they discover that the police are looking for them, they're convinced that they're in big trouble and take off. Complications ensue.
tagline: Side-splitting Spree of Two Pals in Paree. DON'T MISS THIS ONE!
title: Legionnaires in Paris
